explains: n. 解剖，切开；解剖体；详细查究

sentences.en: Researchers need a growing supply of corpses for dissection.
sentences.cn: 研究者们为了解剖需要越来越多的尸体。

sentences.en: Your enjoyment of a novel can suffer from too much analysis and dissection.
sentences.cn: 对一部小说过多的剖析可能会影响你对它的欣赏。

sentences.en: The Listing 4 dissection of classes lists basic component operations.
sentences.cn: 清单4对类的剖析列出了基本组件操作。
